data.message: The lyrics of this song were my 2000 New Year present from my daughter. I taught my Bulgarian 6 grade students to sing the part of Dodo and a boy took the part of Eminem. I would hold this memory all my life! Love it so much!

replies.message: You do understand that the song is about a man killing his girlfriend and unborn child, right?

That's not at all what the song was about...awkward. The song was about an obsessed fan who was spiralling out of control because he was getting nothing back from em. He started with love for em, but by the end of the song he hated him, went nuts and killed his girl and kid. That's just what happened, not what it was about.

"Hey, Slim, that's my girlfriend screaming in the trunk,
But I didn't slit her throat, I just tied her up. See, I ain't like you
'Cause if she suffocates she'll suffer more, and then she'll die, too"

Mike James, we could argue semantics but I think we could both agree this isn't a cute song for a 6th grade class to bond over lol.
